description: Data was extracted from TCGA DCC on February 2017. Copy-number segmentation information was generated using the Affymetrix Genome Wide SNP 6.0 array.
friendlyName: TCGA HG19 COPY NUMBER SEGMENT MASKED 2017 VERSIONED

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089  --  note that each case typically has a primary-tumor sample and a matched-normal (blood or adjacent tissue) sample; please refer to the TCGA Biospecimen table for more details
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Original TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A  --  note that one sample may have multiple aliquots and therefore multiple sets of CN segmentations; so be sure to use GROUP BY appropriately in your queries
fields.name: sample_barcode

fields.description: Original TCGA aliquot barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01
fields.name: aliquot_barcode

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX
fields.name: chromosome

fields.description: 1-based start chromosome position of CN segment start-position
fields.name: start_pos

fields.description: 1-based end chromosome position of CN segment end- position
fields.name: end_pos

fields.description: Number of probes in the SNP array used to infer this CN segment
fields.name: num_probes

fields.description: Mean CN value for this segment -- the value is base2 log(CN/2), centered at 0
fields.name: segment_mean

fields.description: Platform used to generate these data (Genome_Wide_SNP_6 for this data)
fields.name: platform
